original_title: Hush Little Baby Welcome To The Family
overview: A dysfunctional family seeks vengeance on the townspeople who they feel are looking down at them. The twisted family paints their faces and takes to the street to exact vengeance. An unsuspecting couple and their infant son confront the psychotic family who follow them back to their home.

production_companies.name: Boogum Productions: 3878 Oakley Place Kingsport TN 37664

title: Hush Little Baby Welcome To The Family
